net.jawr.web.resource.bundle
Interface JoinableResourceBundle

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositeResourceBundle, JoinableResourceBundleImpl
public interface JoinableResourceBundle

Represents a group of related resources which will be referred to by a single name.

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi

Method Detail

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Returns the bundle name

Returns:
the bundle name

getId

java.lang.String getId()
Returns the ID for this bundle. The URL, which will identify the bundle. It will normally end with .js or .css, since it will be used to refer to the bundle in URLs.

Returns:
the ID for this bundle

isComposite

boolean isComposite()
Returns true if the bundle if composite

Returns:
true if the bundle if composite

getInclusionPattern

InclusionPattern getInclusionPattern()
Get the InclusionPattern to determine when/if this bundle should be included with current configuration.

Returns:
the InclusionPattern

void setMappings(java.util.List mappings)
Sets the mappings, which should be used for the bundle

Parameters:
mappings - the mapping of the resources of the bundle

getLicensesPathList

getURLPrefix

java.lang.String getURLPrefix(java.util.Map variants)
Get the URL prefix for this Bundle. It is used to force redownloading when needed.

Returns the bundle data hashcode

Parameters:

Returns:
the bundle data hashcode

setBundleDataHashCode

void setBundleDataHashCode(java.lang.String variantKey,
                           java.lang.String bundleDataHashCode)
Set the hashcode of the string representing the bundled files. Used to generate an automatic version url prefix.

Parameters:
the - variant key
hashCode - the string representation of the hash code where the minus is replace by a "N" character.

getExplorerConditionalExpression

java.lang.String getExplorerConditionalExpression()
For bundles to be included for IE only within a conditional comment, this method returns the expression to use.

Returns:
The expression for the conditional comment, or null if the bundle should be included for all browsers.
